DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation of target organs impairment on patients suffering from high blood pressure without known cardio vascular or renal disease, stratified on blood pressure control.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Target Organs Impairment on Patients Suffering From High Blood Pressure
DOC.criteria: Adults with hypertension (treated or not), without known cardiovascular or renal disease.
DOC.keyword: Evaluation of target organs impairment on patients suffering from high blood pressure without known cardiovascular or renal disease
